message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid I can't meet you at $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $110. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your new offer. How about $105?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'll counteroffer at $115. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
I'm getting close, but I still need to make some room in my budget. How about $112?

I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer, Bob. I think $115 is a fair price for this product, and I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the point where I might need to consider other buyers. I'll stick with my previous counteroffer of $115. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer. How about $112.50?

I'm starting to lose patience, Bob. I've already made several concessions and I'm not willing to go any lower than $115. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need you to meet me at $114. If you're not willing to do that, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your final offer. How about $112.75?
